summary.span: 表示消息的一组属性。

span.span: Represents a set of properties for a message.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息在通道基础结构中传递时，会经过多个在逻辑上独立的处理实体。As a message passes through the channel infrastructure, it passes through a number of logically separate processing entities. 例如，可靠消息流中的某条消息可能会经过 、传输级别通道提供程序、可靠消息通道提供程序、流通道提供程序或任何通道扩展。For instance, a message that is part of a reliable messaging stream can potentially pass through a , a transport-level channel provider, the reliable-messaging channel provider, the streaming channel provider or any channel extensions. 有时，这些中介会利用 类，以处理结果对消息进行批注。Sometimes these intermediaries annotate the message with the results of that processing by using the class. 实例是消息的批注，以一组名称到对象的映射形式存储在 实例的 属性中。A instance is an annotation on a message and is stored as a set of name-to-object mappings in the property of a instance. > [!NOTE] > 消息属性应清除，当用户会收到以下错误：The message properties should be cleared out when the user gets the following error: > > **服务器提交协议冲突。部分 = ResponseBody 详细信息 = 响应块区格式无效****The server committed a protocol violation. Section=ResponseBody Detail=Response chunk format is invalid**

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，这样垃圾回收器才能收回 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the occupied. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不会释放正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 客户端身份验证结果会转换为 的实例，该实例是透过 附加到消息上。HTTP client authentication results are translated into an instance of , which is attached to the message using a . 此属性可供较高层使用，以实现任意授权逻辑。This property can be used by higher layers to implement arbitrary authorization logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输通道拥有 属性，其会覆盖您为消息头设置的任何值。The transport channel owns the property and it overwrites whatever value you set for the message headers. 必须将该频道的一个机会`Via`，即从通道工厂的通道的创建过程，例如，用。You do have one opportunity to set the channel's `Via`, which is during the creation of the channel from the channel factory, for example, with .
